Traits.Name: Dire Hide
Traits.Description: Resistant to physical damage while not bloody.

Traits.Name: Heavy Armor
Traits.Description: Immune to pierce when not bloody. Cannot dash or run.

Traits.Name: Rolling Boulder
Traits.Description: Gains character phasing, and when moving through foes for the first time in a round, they are shoved 1 to the side and take fray damage.

Traits.Name: Flank
Traits.Description: Loses all armor if 2 or more foes are adjacent.
